channel.title: Easter ring Code. [PI] Pro Ins
channel.description:
Hey, guys im trying to add easter ring effect, where you turn into a egg. but i keep getting this error. this the two guides i tried.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=463235.0 http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/312940-pi-easter-ring-you-cant-walk-while-wearing.html
this is the error.
src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:41: class, interface, or enum exp ected if(c.wearId == 7927) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:43: class, interface, or enum exp ected for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:43: class, interface, or enum exp ected for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:43: class, interface, or enum exp ected for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:45: class, interface, or enum exp ected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:48: class, interface, or enum exp ected c.sendMessage("As you put on the ring you turn into an egg!"); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:49: class, interface, or enum exp ected c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:50: class, interface, or enum exp ected c.isNpc = true; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:51: class, interface, or enum exp ected c.updateRequired = true; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:52: class, interface, or enum exp ected c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:53: class, interface, or enum exp ected } ^ 11 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Easter ring Code. [PI] Pro Ins
item.dc:creator: @I_love_U_I I love U I
item.description:

Hey, guys im trying to add easter ring effect, where you turn into a egg. but i keep getting this error. this the two guides i tried.
